en.content: The driver smokes and watches as you drag your cases to the back of the motor coach. The rack is set inconveniently high on the vehicle. You get a grip on the heavier case.

text.content: Your “SIZ” value has influenced the game's branching paths.

zh.content: 司机叼着烟，看着你把箱子拖到长途汽车的后面去。行李架装在车顶上，十分不便。你握紧了沉重的箱子。

text.content: （你的“体型”数值对游戏分支产生了影响。）
